Activities commonly implemented under this intervention

Develop animal identification, traceability and performance recording.
Include livestock data in the agriculture census.
Develop a database on livestock production at the central level.

Guidance for increased animal health sustainability

P3 P6. Include data on use of AM and AW indicators in livestock information systems.
P2.P4. Include data on animal diseases and treatment, including for zoonosis.
P2.P7. Include training and resources for the collection of data that enable disease risk assessment, including information on transport of animals.
P7. Make provisions for the training on the use of the information system, including epidemiological surveillance and risk assessment.
